metadata.synopsis: Nealos Bright, Refugee_15, is worried about Gronch, who aided him and his brother to get this far.

0.speaker: Nealos Bright
0.text: I don't know, maybe Greg has some ideas about how we can help Gronch get inside the walls. I can't think straight anymore.

1.speaker: Nealos Bright
1.text: We've got to get Gronch into the city, but he's in no shape to travel. I wonder... what if we hid him in a big barrel and nailed it shut? ...Nah.
